nodes.text: The Capper spineflap was a type of creature that could be found on Naboo.
Circa 1 ABY, the hunter Walker Luskeske asked a spacer to kill mountain spineflaps in the Gallo Mountains, including Sprywing, and bring him wings and talons as trophies.

Capper spineflaps appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
